column1:
Overall, the sentiment percentages for Cleaniness, Amenities, Location, Services, and General steadily improved over the years. Cleaniness had the lowest sentiment rating, while Amenities had the highest. 

Suggestions for improvement: 
Cleaniness: Increase cleaning staff and frequency of cleanings in order to create a healthier environment. 
Amenities: Expand the range of amenities available in order to create a more comfortable and enjoyable stay. 
Location: Make sure the location is in an accessible area with public transportation and other amenities. 
Services: Provide higher quality customer service in order to create a more efficient and enjoyable experience. 
General: Ensure the facilities are up-to-date and well-maintained to create a more pleasant atmosphere.
